org.bubblecloud.zigbee.network.port

Class ZigBeeNetworkManagerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bubblecloud.zigbee.network.port.ZigBeeNetworkManagerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ZigBeeNetworkManager

    public class ZigBeeNetworkManagerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ZigBeeNetworkManager
    The zigbee network manager port implementation.
    Author:
    Stefano "Kismet" Lenzi, Michele Girolami, Manlio Bacco, Tommi S.E. Laukkanen, Chris Hatton, Chris Jackson
